abstract: Lions Gate Entertainment said Friday that it had rejected Carl C. Icahn’s proposal to increase his stake in the movie company to nearly 30 percent, calling the billionaire investor’s offer “financially inadequate.”
snippet: Lions Gate Entertainment said Friday that it had rejected Carl C. Icahn’s proposal to increase his stake in the movie company to nearly 30 percent, calling the billionaire investor’s offer “financially inadequate.”
lead_paragraph: Lions Gate Entertainment said Friday that it had rejected Carl C. Icahn‘s proposal to increase his stake in the movie company to nearly 30 percent, calling the billionaire investor’s offer “financially inadequate.”

headline.main: Lions Gate Rejects Icahn Offer as ‘Inadequate’

abstract: Walt Disney Studios will wind down Robert Zemeckis’ motion-capture company as part of overall cost-cutting.
snippet: Walt Disney Studios will wind down Robert Zemeckis’ motion-capture company as part of overall cost-cutting.
lead_paragraph: Walt Disney Studios pulled the plug on Robert Zemeckis’s motion-capture company on Friday, the latest in a string of cost-cutting moves. ImageMovers Digital, which is based near San Francisco and employs 450 people, will slowly wind down production over the next few months.
